channel.title: Compiler error - need help!
channel.description:
Got this error when trying to compile:
[code]Compiling net/com/codeusa/Engine.java src\net\com\codeusa\Engine.java:75: cannot access net.com.codeusa.ShopHandler bad class file: src\net\com\codeusa\ShopHandler.java file does not contain class net.com.codeusa.ShopHandler Please remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpa th. public static ShopHandler shopHandler = new ShopHandler(); ^ Press any key to continue . .[/code]
Does anyone know what this and how to fix it?

item.title: Compiler error - need help!
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

remove or make sure it appears in the correct subdirectory of the classpath.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error - need help!
item.dc:creator: @Jazzelhawk Jazzelhawk
item.description:
@Jazzelhawk wrote:

Well I don’t know, I am trying to get my shops working because when ever I try to buy something it doesn’t work, It just pauses for 3 seconds. I am using Mast3r Pkyz source, He says its a 525 but I don’t think it is. It is very different from a 525 but not a 508 somewhere in the middle.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error - need help!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Make sure your Java is up to date. Also, make sure when you’re editing your Shop Configuration file that you use the “Tab” button instead of spacing. What’s the last thing you edited in your ShopHandler Class?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error - need help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Real_Asian The Real Asian
item.description:
@The_Real_Asian wrote:

click the announcement in server help compiling errors. and look in there, if its not in there reply on that post. hopes i helped you.

Read full topic
